attributes.action: Build A Large Inpenetrable Fence Around Hull To Protect The Surrounding Areas From Those People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would argue to knock down Hull but this would mean the integration of those from Hull with those of other areas in the UK.
Please can you build a large inpenetrable wall so we can keep those people from Hull inside Hull, and keep those areas outside of Hull much cleaner, tidier and pleasent.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
